title: Zamrock Music: A Cool Old Sound from Zambia
summary: Zamrock is a fun music style from Zambia in the 1970s. It mixes rock music with Zambian sounds. Today, artists like Sampa the Great are bringing it back. She is a rapper who uses Zamrock in her new songs. Other famous musicians, like Travis Scott, also use Zamrock in their music. Zamrock was made when Zambia became free from British rule. It was a time of new freedom and boldness. Bands like WITCH played loud shows with colorful clothes. Now, Zamrock is in TV shows too. It is a cool old sound that is popular again.

background_read: Zamrock is a music genre from Zambia that started in the 1970s. It combines psychedelic rock with traditional Zambian music. This happened after Zambia gained independence from British rule, creating a sense of new freedom. Bands like WITCH became popular with loud shows and colorful outfits. Today, modern artists are rediscovering Zamrock, using it in new songs and TV shows, making it cool again for young people to enjoy.
